dc_title_s: Map of the city of Detroit, Michigan, 1899 : showing paved streets, public schools, police stations, fire engine and ladder houses
dc_description_s: Includes indices to schools, fire stations, and police department.   Color indicates type of street: asphalt, brick, cedar on concrete, etc.   Also shows railways and street car lines.|62 x 80 centimeters|Scale not given.|City Maps
